itemdesc-villagerhorn: Can be used to call for help
interact-villager-horn: Aim at the ground nearby and blow it to call for help by freeing a villager from the rust world!
villagerguide-text: Villages and Villagers You can come across villages while travelling the world. The people roaming these villages are generally friendly as long as not provoked. Some will trade with you, others might be able to protect you from evil foes. Most of them will carry out some small tasks during the day depending on their profession. There is also the possibility to found your own village. All you need is to craft a horn and blow it to summon a villager. If you have VS Quest installed, you will even be able to accept missions from various villagers. VS Quest will also be useful for populating villages, as it also enables a new type of villager, the mayor, who will help you get everything up and running for your village. Once you summoned a couple of villagers, you will need to provide shelter for them. Each villager wants to have a bed to sleep in during the night and a work station for staying busy during the day. Your villagers also like to gather at a fire place during the evening to do some socializing.
tradingwindow-humanoid-villager-male-tra: Village demand - {0} the supplier of useful stuff
tradingwindow-humanoid-villager-female-t: Village demand - {0} the supplier of useful stuff
quest-gatherMeatForSeed-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 25 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gatherMeatForGrain-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you some grain in return.
quest-gather10MeatFor4FlaxSeeds-title: There is no protein in flax fibre
quest-gather10MeatFor4FlaxSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 10 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gather10MeatFor4ParsnipSeeds-title: There is no protein in parsnips
quest-gather10MeatFor4ParsnipSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 10 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gather10MeatFor4TurnipSeeds-title: There is no protein in turnips
quest-gather10MeatFor4TurnipSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 10 meat of any kind, I could offer you some in return.
quest-gather10MeatFor4CarrotSeeds-title: There is no protein in carrots
quest-gather10MeatFor4CarrotSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 10 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gather10MeatFor4OnionSeeds-title: There is no protein in onions
quest-gather10MeatFor4OnionSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 10 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gather10MeatFor4SpeltSeeds-title: There is no protein in grain
quest-gather10MeatFor4SpeltSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 10 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-cull2HaresFor20Carrots-desc: Those horrible hares keep eating my crops. Get rid of them and I'll share some carrots with you.
quest-cull2HaresFor20Spelt-desc: Those horrible hares keep eating my crops. Get rid of them and I'll share some spelt with you.
quest-sell1CheesewheelFor4Gears-title: Would love cheese for my bread
quest-sell1CheesewheelFor4Gears-desc: I made some gears from a passing traveler. I would be happy to buy some cheese from you if you have a wheel spare.
quest-gather12CharcoalFor4Gears-desc: I want to produce some new iron tools but forgot to prepare the charcoal. Can you help me gather some coal for me? I could pay you.
quest-buy1BlackGuardSword-title: Creating a weapon of great power
quest-buy1BlackGuardSword-desc: If you hand me the materials as well as some payment for my work, I could create a weapon of exceptional quality for you.
quest-buy1BlackGuardSword-obj:
Gathered iron ingots: {0}/1
Gathered charcoal: {1}/1
Gathered rusty gears: {2}/4
quest-upgradeGambison-desc: With payment and a set of gambison I could tailor it to fit you better I reckon.
quest-upgradeGambison-obj:
Gambison head: {0}/1
Gambison body: {1}/1
Gambison legs: {2}/1
Gathered rusty gears: {3}/32
quest-gather16HayFor1BlueCheesewheel-des: I need help gathering Hay for the lifestock, gather 16 of it and I can share some cheese from my stockpile.
quest-gather16HayFor1CheddarCheesewheel-: I need help gathering Hay for the lifestock, gather 16 of it and I can share some cheese from my stockpile.
quest-gather6GrainFor12Eggs-desc: My hens need more grain to keep up how many eggs they are laying. I will happliy give you a dozen eggs for some grain.
quest-gather24GrainFor18Poultry-desc: My chickens have grown old and fat. I need to make room for the younger generations to grow properly. For some simple grain I can offer you some meat.
quest-gather24GrainFor18Redmeat-desc: My sheep have grown old and fat. I need to make room for the younger generations to grow properly. For some simple grain I can offer you some meat.
quest-kill2WolvesFor8Gears-desc: The wolves are loosing their respect for fire. They are getting closer and closer to the cattle I am herding. I can compensate you if you fend them off.
quest-kill3FoxesFor8Gear-desc: Recently a fox broke into my chicken coop and decimated my lifestock. I do not want this to happen again. If anyone is able to hunt down six of these foxes I would be willing to pay a gear for it.
quest-kill50DriftersFor20Gears-desc: The woods simply aren't safe anymore. Drifters are everywhere. If you could clear the surrounding area from drifters, we could pay you a fair price.
quest-kill2NightmareDriftersFor12Gears-t: The growling from the unspeakable depths
quest-kill2NightmareDriftersFor12Gears-d: We can no longer extract minerals from the mountains because of the creatures that lurk in the caves deep down below. We would be willing to pay a generous price for anyone helping to clear the depths from nightmare drifters.
quest-recruit1farmer-desc: If you can provide shelter, a workplace and a little bit of payment, I am able to recruit one more farmer to the village.
quest-recruit1farmer-obj:
Rusty gears: {0}/6
Worksations placed: {1}/1
Beds placed: {2}/1
quest-recruit1shepherd-title: More shepherds caring for the cattle
quest-recruit1shepherd-desc: If you can provide shelter, a workplace  and a little bit of payment, I am able to recruit one more shepherd to the village.
quest-recruit1shepherd-obj:

Beds placed: {2}/1

quest-recruit1trader-obj:

Worksations placed: {1}/1
Beds placed: {2}/1
quest-foundvillage-start-desc: Greetings, traveler. I have been searching the lands in hopes of finding someone capable of laying the foundation of a safe haven for anyone roaming the lands. If you proof that you can handle yourself in the wilds, I can gather a small group of nomads to follow your lead.
quest-foundvillage-start-obj:
Gathered grain: {0}/20
Gathered vegetables: {1}/20
Gathered meat: {2}/10
Killed drifters: {3}/30
Placed farmer workstations: {4}/2
Placed trader workstations: {5}/1
Placed beds: {6}/3
quest-foundvillage-1-desc: You did not think this would be cheap, did you? Founding a village can be quite costly. On the plus side, this will enable us to hire some guards.
quest-foundvillage-1-obj:
Rusty gears: {0}/32
Placed soldier workstations: {1}/2
Placed beds: {2}/2
quest-foundvillage-2-desc: Soldiers are great and all. But if they get hurt, we need someone capable of treating wounds in our ranks. These people create bandages and healing trinkes from herbs, so it might be good to have some around.
quest-foundvillage-2-obj:
Planted flowers: {0}/16
Placed herbalist workstations: {1}/1
Placed beds: {2}/1
quest-foundvillage-3-desc: Next we need a worker to create the tools, weapons and armor. A smith will come in handy on many occasions.
quest-foundvillage-3-obj:
Gathered bronze ingots: {0}/4
Gathered charcoal: {1}/16
Placed smith workstations: {2}/1
Placed beds: {3}/1
quest-foundvillage-final-desc: More and more people gain hope that this outpost could actually be made to last. To really gain their trust, proof that even the strongest beings from the rustworld do not stand a chance against you.
quest-foundvillage-final-obj:
Nightmare drifters killed: {0}/1
Placed soldier workstations: {1}/1
Placed beds: {2}/1
quest-recruitvillager-desc: For a small amount of gears I can escort and protect you for a day.
quest-repairingAnOldSet1-desc: I need a copper ingot for a new medical needle. I have an old set of armor that I can give you piece by piece if you keep working with me.
quest-repairingAnOldSet2-desc: I need some flaxtwine to make bandages and to fix the hole in this armor set I'm giving to you.
quest-repairingAnOldSet3-desc: If you can get me food for winter I will give you the last piece of the armor set I have.
quest-sell24HorsetailFor3Gears-desc: Supplys are running low and I need some more horsetail, I can pay of cause.
quest-sell10PowderedSulfurFor2Gears-desc: Supplys are running low and I need some more powdered sulfur, I can pay of cause.
quest-healplayersetup-desc: To be able to act as your healer I require some basic things. Stuff for bandages, a stone and stick for crushing herbs and honeycomb to treat wounds. I can become self sufficient after you get me these starting things.
quest-healplayersetup-obj:
Gathered horsetail: {0}/12
Gathered stone: {1}/1
Gathered stick: {2}/1
Gathered honeycomb: {3}/2
Gathered cattails: {0}/12
quest-healplayer-desc: If you ever take a beating, I am able to take a look at your wounds.
